io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.particle

Interface Particle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextureParticle

    public interface Particle
    An interface representing a particle.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void doBehaviour(World w, float wind, java.util.List<Particle> particles, float delta)
      Performs behaviour calculations on this particle.
      float getAlpha()
      Gets the transparency of this particle.
      default int getTexture()
      Gets the texture of this particle.
      float getX()
      Gets the X position of this particle.
      float getY()
      Gets the Y position of this particle.

      Determines if the particle uses custom rendering.
      default boolean isLightAffected()
      Determines if the particle is affected by light.

      Renders the particle.

    • Method Detail

      • isCustom

        default boolean isCustom()
        Determines if the particle uses custom rendering.
        Returns:
        true if the particle uses custom rendering, false otherwise.

      • isLightAffected

        default boolean isLightAffected()
        Determines if the particle is affected by light.

      • getTexture

        default int getTexture()
        Gets the texture of this particle.
        Returns:
        A texture ID.

      • render

        default void render(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g,
                    float sx,
                    float sy)
        Renders the particle.
        Parameters:
        g - The current graphics context.
        sx - The X position to render at.
        sy - The Y position to render at.

      • getX

        float getX()
        Gets the X position of this particle.
        Returns:
        A float value.

      • getY

        float getY()
        Gets the Y position of this particle.
        Returns:
        A float value.

      • doBehaviour

        default void doBehaviour(World w,
                         float wind,
                         java.util.List<Particle> particles,
                         float delta)
        Performs behaviour calculations on this particle.
        Parameters:
        w - The world the particle is in.
        wind - The current wind value.
        particles - The list of all particles.
        delta - The time since the last update in seconds.

      • getAlpha

        float getAlpha()
        Gets the transparency of this particle.
        Returns:
        A float value in the range 0..1.
